Posts.EditableText:
I saw 3 un-white muslim's (maybe the same boy *shrugs*) in the newspaper this morning as I passed the 'wall-of-magazines' in the shop.
Didn't really care to stop and read too much, but it did say 3 muslims and provide 3 photo's.

How can you have "towel-heads" as one group of people, and "british" as the other? You can have British muslims, just like you can have white-African's (originally from Britain's former 'Empire', but born in Africa somewhere).
If you mean coloured, or mix-skinned (is it mixed skinned? what are the 'middle people'?) then it's not offensive (or if it is, then they have serious self-hate issues) to say 'black'.

Posts.EditableText:
my ex girlfriends sister was in 3.  She was late for the train that blew up, and almost got caught in the second station bomb.  She was on the bus that was behind the bus that blew up.  the front of her bus was wrecked but luckily she was sitting at the back.  She then got put on a train that had 2 bombs on it, and got evacuated while they defused them (I haven't read about that one so i'm not sure if that actually happened, or if it wa just a scare).

Must have been like final destination or something.
